title: Dj Sona, Will the summoner ( me) be able to hear the music
body: So i bought dj sona and i love her skin but i thought that you ( as the player) could also hear her music in game, is there going to be an update that will allow me as the player also hear the music ?

replies.body: It's a bit low, make sure your Music slider is turned up.

As Sona, you're able to hear the music. You'll need to make sure your music slider is turned up in the audio settings. 

If you have a Sona on your team, you can opt in by holding tab, and hitting the music note icon.
You enable it by holding the tab key to open the scoreboard, and there will be an icon next to her portrait that lets you enable it.

As Valkyrie Witch said, It is quieter than expected, but also remember that it starts off as just singular layer of the song and as you level up, more layers are added until you hit level 6 when the song becomes complete.

So at the beginning of the game, it won't sound like the song on the soundtrack.
